name: Assassin Coli
description: An agile assassin hiding in the silence
story: A silent assassin in the shadows, it is said that anyone who sees the glint of Assassin Coli's blade in the moonlight will not live much longer.
get_line: I am the assassin Nicolette Fleure.

relations.description: Someone who keeps following her, insisting she's the real Coli. Assassin Coli thinks she's lying.
An annoying mercenary helping the strange person insisting she's the real Coli.
Assassin Coli admires Sez, who takes care of his target quietly and skillfully.
A dog-like comrade. Not only is his appearance dog-like, but his intellect is too.

specialty.name: Split Second
specialty.description: Victory becomes hers in the blink of an eye.

skills.name: Ambush
skills.description: Ambushes the enemy. When the caster is stealthed, increases damage dealt and increases Speed of the caster for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Murder
skills.description: Moves silently to attack the enemy, silencing all enemies for 1 turn when the enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
skills.enhanced_description: Moves silently to attack the enemy, stunning for 1 turn. Silences all enemies for 1 turn when the target is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

buffs.name: Stealth
buffs.effect: Cannot be selected as a target for attacks if there are other allies, and suffers decreased damage from AoE attacks. Dispelled after taking damage from a skill attack.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.

debuffs.name: Silence
debuffs.effect: The target cannot use skills that require cooldowns.

ex_equip.name: Silent Daggers
ex_equip.description: A pair of daggers that Assassin Coli has been using since before she joined Dagger Sicar.

skills.description: Damage dealt is increased by 10% when using Ambush.
Removes 3 Souls from the enemy after using Ambush.
skills.skill_description: Ambushes the enemy. Removes 3 Souls from the opponent. When the caster is stealthed, increases damage dealt and increases Speed of the caster for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.description: Grants the caster immunity for 2 turns after using Murder.
skills.skill_description: Moves silently to attack the enemy, stunning for 1 turn, before granting immunity to the caster for 2 turns. Silences all enemies for 1 turn when the target is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skill1.name: 奇襲
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃する。自身が潜伏状態の場合、ダメージがUPし、自身にスピードUPを1ターンの間付与する。更に自身のスピードが高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: 待ち伏せ
skill2.desc: 自身が弱体状態でない場合、それぞれ80.0%の確率でターン開始時に攻撃力UPを1ターンの間付与し、ターン終了時に潜伏を1ターンの間付与する。

skill3.name: 暗殺
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、対象が気絶した場合、敵全体に沈黙を1ターンの間付与する。自身のスピードが高いほどダメージがUPする。
skill3.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、対象が気絶した場合、敵全体に沈黙を1ターンの間付与する。自身のスピードが高いほどダメージがUPする。
